name: Jarvan IV
title: the Exemplar of Demacia
lore: Prince Jarvan, scion of the Lightshield dynasty, is heir apparent to the throne of Demacia. Raised to be a paragon of his nation's greatest virtues, he is forced to balance the heavy expectations placed upon him with his own desire to fight on the front lines. Jarvan inspires his troops with his fearsome courage and selfless determination, raising his family's colors high and revealing his true strength as a future leader of his people.
blurb: Prince Jarvan, scion of the Lightshield dynasty, is heir apparent to the throne of Demacia. Raised to be a paragon of his nation's greatest virtues, he is forced to balance the heavy expectations placed upon him with his own desire to fight on the front...
allytips: You can use the Dragon Strike / Demacian Standard combo to get out of your own Cataclysm arenas.
Split your basic attacks on different champions at the beginning of fights to maximize damage.
Use Demacian Standard as a scouting tool when worried about incoming enemies.
enemytips: Keep out of the path between Jarvan IV and his Demacian Standard to avoid being knocked up in the air.
Cataclysm's terrain is a frightening force to fight against, but movement abilities can go through it.

riot_spell_q.name: Dragon Strike
riot_spell_q.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

riot_spell_w.name: Golden Aegis
riot_spell_w.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% max Health] for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Demacian Standard
riot_spell_e.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

riot_spell_r.name: Cataclysm
riot_spell_r.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ damagecalc }} physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for {{ wallduration }} seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

riot_spell_i.name: Martial Cadence
riot_spell_i.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Martial Cadence
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Jarvan IV's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|8% of target's '''current''' health}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, with a minimum of 20 damage and capped at 400 damage against non-champions.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* The triggering attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal, as well as apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage will not do any of these and neither will it affect structures.
* ''Martial Cadence'' will not be applied if the attack is {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if it {{tip|blind|misses}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Dragon Strike
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' extends his lance in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reducing their armor}}}} for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|10 to 26}}% of target's armor}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If the lance connects with a deployed {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}}, '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dashes}} to it, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} nearby enemies along his path for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Dragon Strike's'' damage will not benefit from its own armor reduction.
* ''Dragon Strike'' will still pull ''Jarvan IV'' to his {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}} if he is immobilized but he will remain as such when he reaches his destination (duration permitting).

wikia_skill_w1.name: Golden Aegis
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|slow|slows}} all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: '''Jarvan IV''' also {{tip|shields}} himself for 5 seconds, increased by {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% of '''Jarvan IV's''' '''maximum''' health}} for each enemy champion hit by ''Golden Aegis''.
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * ''Golden Aegis'' has no cast time and will not interrupt ''Jarvan IV's'' previous orders.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Demacian Standard
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jarvan IV''' gains permanent {{sti|attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' throws a ''Demacian flag'' to the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} around it and providing an [[aura]] that grants ''Demacian Standard's'' {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} to all nearby allied champions.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* The bonus attack speed from ''Demacian Standard's'' aura will apply to ''Jarvan IV'' and stack with its passive's.
* ''Demacian Standard'' can be targeted by allied minion-targetable abilities ({{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}).
* Even though the ''Demacian Standard'' has a finite amount of health it is both untargetable to enemy basic attacks as well as immune to area-of-effect damage.
** This makes it effectively invincible and indestructible.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Cataclysm
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to an enemy champion and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain for {{fd|3.5}} seconds that grants {{tip|sight}} around it. '''Jarvan IV''' can reactivate ''Cataclysm'' to destroy the circle.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Cataclysm'' will not deal damage, generate terrain, or refund its cooldown if ''Jarvan IV'' is killed mid-leap.
* ''Cataclysm'' does not track targets who transit out of their location.
* {{cai|Searing Charge|Ornn}} will not destroy the whole ring but only the part that {{ci|Ornn}} collides to.
